title: Show Boss Chest Tooltips
description:
When viewing a boss chest, display all three relic tooltips.

Primarily for use with [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1610759491]Slay the Streamer[/url], so chat can see what modded relics do.

GitHub: https://github.com/dvide/StS-ShowBossChestTips
